document.full_text: forces loyal to col. muammar el-qaddafi scattered land mines on the city's port, threatening once more to close the only route for evacuation and supplies.
document.title: land mines descend on misurata's port, endangering libyan city's supply route
lines_and_colors: forces loyal to col. muammar el-qaddafi scattered land mines on the city's port, threatening once more to close the only route for evacuation and supplies.
